Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 40 balls
Andries Gous scored an unbeaten 80 from 47 balls
Kagiso Rabada took key wickets including Harmeet Singh and Kumar
Anrich Nortje dismissed Corey Anderson with a yorker
Pre-Game Insights: USA won the toss and chose to bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: Aidan Markram expressed satisfaction with the overall performance but noted areas for improvement
USA captain Aaron Jones highlighted the need for more discipline in bowling
Quinton de Kock was named player of the match and commented on the tricky wickets and the pressure from the USA
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's win put them top of Group 2 in the Super Eights
USA's performance sends a signal to their next Super 8 opponents, England and West Indies
